title: Are you kidding me....Fiora can Counter a Ignite(summoner spell)
body: thee most IMBALANCED move i ever face....come on please change that...

replies.body: Except the only times it happens is completely by accident, and if Fiora is parrying your combo, odds are ignite by itself wasn't going to kill her

yeah figured that

she had 70 hp, ignite was 150, and i ulted her

but she lived with 12hp which was weird, she coutnered th ignite/my zed ult at same time


either very lucky or very skilled

Ignite is instant with no real tell, which
means it is on the player using it not to waste it on a riposte.

the summoner spells are instantaneous. you cant consciously react to them. meaning its more of a fault of you trying to ignite her during riposte than that she planned to riposte your ignite.

just keep her riposte in mind the next time you face her and it shouldnt be an issue anymore.
Annoying when she parry's my exhaust when I would have saved an adc otherwise :(
if fiora riposted your ignite, she deserves a cookie
